rep.text: Hey, a Na'Hum, I never thought I will see one with my own eyes! I'm Jo'si. How can...
Could you stop using this word please? My name is Giovanni...
Forgive me, Gio! How can I help you?
I was told you got problems with snakes up here.
Yes! Finally someone to deal with it! I would do it myself, but they scare me!
You are lucky I'm here then... Because I had to deal with them on my trip around Australia...
Aus'Tra'Lia? Is it a land of snakes? Where is it?
Somewhere far-far away... I'll just need a torch, they hate fire.
You can have mine! Could I also...
No, nevermind, you wouldn't care anyway...
My son Za'Ji has gone missing! He probably went off to fight the snakes. Could you bring him back if you see him?
Alright, I will look for him.
Oh thank you! You don't look or sound anywhere near how our legends portray you...
